DOC.brief_title: Study 2.25mm Sirolimus-Eluting Stent Treatment Patients With Coronary Artery Lesions
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter ( approximately 10 - 14 site ) , prospective , non-randomized study . The study design evaluate safety effectiveness sirolimus-eluting Bx VELOCITYTM stent patient de novo native coronary artery lesion . A total 100 patient enter study . Patients meet eligibility criterion enrol study . Patients follow 30 day , 6 , 9 , 12 month , 2 , 3 , 4 5 year post-procedure , patient undergo repeat angiography 6 month . Approximately 50 patient require intravascular ultrasound ( IVUS ) procedure baseline 6-month angiographic follow-up .
